text: Malco Ramírez Martínez (born 28 March 1970) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2010 to 2012 he served as Deputy of the LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Puebla. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Puebla Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians
title: Malco Ramírez Martínez
